WRITING.TEXT: reaching for my iced skinny vanilla latte($5.40) I almost drank from acetone nail polish remover($3.99) because I was painting my nails with Essie nail polish($9.49). All while wearing an outfit where the skirt alone cost over 100 bucks. Clearly spoiled white girl.

a monroe is super cute! http://www.ael-labret-piercing.co.uk/Monroe-piercing.htm
or an anti tragus http://havenbodyarts.com/PiercingTypes/AntiTragus-Piercing-Haven-Body-Arts-Northampton-Ma.html

I had laser surgery(well, I don't know if surgery is the right word but they did use lasers) to remove the scars on my arms and legs from self harm. I was sick of people going "omg, what happened to you?" It really helped me get over my past, and made it possible to wear short sleeves and shorts again. In short, it really helped me.
i would like that, thank you

WRITING.TITLE: How to go from dark brown to blonde with the least amount of damage?
WRITING.TEXT: Hair is currently dark brown(http://www.extendedlengths.com/prchsicrha4b.html), naturally dirty blonde. I'm looking to go back to my natural color with the least amount of damage to my already dyed and damaged hair. Any hints? Thanks, my fancy ladies!(and gents)
I literally just bought this and she's not kidding, the results are AMAZING. lemme say it another time for emphasis, AMAZING. totally worth 35 bucks, if it lasts.

WRITING.TITLE: What to wear to a college spring gala?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm going to my school's spring gala in a few weeks, and have NO IDEA WHAT TO WEAR. How formal are these things anyway? Is it acceptable to wear black? Links, comments, ideas, anything would be greatly appreciated. Thanks, you lovey ladies of FFA!
